document.full_text: china's yuan is close to being a freely usable currency, one of two key tests for it to be included in the international monetary fund's currency basket, the deputy governor of china's central bank said on sunday.
document.title: china's yuan nearly "freely usable": central bank's yi
lines_and_colors: china's yuan is close to being a freely usable currency, one of two key tests for it to be included in the international monetary fund's currency basket, the deputy governor of china's central bank said on sunday.
